sentences.en: An enemy frigate bore down on the sloop.
sentences.cn: 一艘敌驱逐舰向这只护航舰逼过来.

sentences.en: Anti - frigate gunboats . The middle ground between a frigate and a cruiser.
sentences.cn: 反 护卫舰炮舰. 它是在护卫舰和巡洋舰之间.

sentences.en: BUSHAN - RE: The CLEE - SAN ? A frigate class vessel?
sentences.cn: 布申-瑞: 克利-桑? 那艘护卫舰级的飞船?

sentences.en: Caldari Frigate > Skill at operating Caldari frigates.
sentences.cn: 卡尔达利护卫舰》操纵卡尔达利护卫舰的技能.

sentences.en: Fifty - five flags freely flutter from the floating frigate.
sentences.cn: 五十五 面旗子在轻轻漂浮的战舰上自由的飘荡.

sentences.en: For God's sakes, order that frigate to break off!
sentences.cn: 看在上帝的份上让那艘补给舰停下来!

sentences.en: From the beach, this correspondent clocked a couple of Luyang - class destroyers and a missile frigate.
sentences.cn: 在海滩上, 本文记者记录到了两艘旅洋级驱逐舰和一艘导弹护卫舰.

sentences.en: The frigate is on the stocks in a British yard.
sentences.cn: 那艘护航舰现在一家英国造船厂中建造.

sentences.en: The frigate made for the open sea.
The Jiralhanae frigate attack pair appeared, one over one under the carrier.
sentences.cn: 吉拉哈奈的护卫舰攻击组出现了, 一艘在母舰上方另一艘在下方.

sentences.en: The pilot had locked his targeting radar on the slow - moving frigate ( Ed Magnuson )
sentences.cn: 飞行员已经锁定了缓慢移动的护卫船上的雷达目标 ( 埃德马格努森 )

sentences.en: The sailors on that frigate have video cameras!
sentences.cn: 那艘护卫舰上的海员可以有录像带!

sentences.en: This was a tactic neutralized by the a Jiralhanae frigate pair.
sentences.cn: 这是双护卫舰通常采取的标准压制战术.

sentences.en: We sailed the Atlantic; This frigate has sailed to France.
sentences.cn: 我们乘车旅行了大西洋; 护卫舰已经航行到了法国.

trans.tran_en: a small fast ship used especially for protecting other ships in wars
